name: Hero Tower War - Math Puzzle
description:
Many monsters and enemies in the tower. You need to defeat them, get treasures and save hostages.
You can play everywhere ,every time. It is a boring killer game.

HOW TO PLAY:
1 - Use your brain to move your hero
2 - Kill all enemies
3 - Increase your power
4 - Defend your tower

Collect all treasures and become the best hero in Hero Tower Wars.
Enjoy your time.
